Masso-therapy
Massage is also a modality of naturopathy and quite essential for preserving 
health. It aims at improving the blood circulation and also 
strengthening bodily organs. In winter, sun-bath after massaging 
the whole body is a well-known practice of preserving health and strength. It bestows combined benefits of massage and sun-ray therapy. In disease conditions, necessary therapeutic effects can 
be obtained through specific techniques of massage. Massage is a
